title: Ken Shamrock - The Worlds Most Dangerous Man
description:
Ken Shamrock, known as the “World’s Most Dangerous Man” joins me for a hard-hitting interview this week on #MaxOut with Ed Mylett! 

Shamrock is a worldwide recognized MMA fighter and an inductee into the UFC Hall of Fame. He’s a four time UFC Heavy Champion, WWF Tag Team Champion, and the founder of the Lion’s Den, a renowned fighting school where some of the world’s best fighters have trained.

Get ready to hear the story behind this champion’s journey from father-less in a poor neighborhood in Georgia, to victorious many times over on the top fighting stages in the world!
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
